column5:
Merge pull request #779 from TingPing/tingping/solid-suffix

Support installing transparent and non-transparent variant in parallel

Append solid suffix to non-transparent variant

This allows distributions to easily pacakge both without conflicts.
This will also help with Flatpak being able to match the host theme.

Merge pull request #734 from leigh123linux/fix_gradient_warning

cinnamon: fix missing gradient warning
add link to Arc KDE to README.md
add official fedora package name to readme (fix #726)

Merge pull request #723 from GeneralFailer/master

Documentation capitalization fixes

Merge pull request #718 from unixfox/patch-1

Correction of the package name of AUR
Correction of the package name of AUR
gtk2: fix thunar bulk rename entry (fix #707)
be more careful with libreoffice toolbar workaround (#670)

Merge pull request #690 from zach-adams/patch-4

Update Arch Linux package links

Update Arch Linux package links

Arc theme has made it to the official Arch Community package repo meaning Arch users can now install the official releases directly from pacman! The development releases will still be available from the AUR.
cinnamon: use correct path for menu-separator.svg (fix #689)
gtk2: fix geany search combobox border (#674)
add thumbnails for cinnamon theme chooser (#592)
fix disabled entry border-color in header bars (#668)
gtk3: add a workaround for broken Libreoffice toolbar styling
gtk2: fix mousepad find and replace textbox (fix #664)
gtk 3.20: try to fix unity decorations (#660)

Merge pull request #654 from chewi/master

Don't require GTK+3 at configure time when it's not needed
add borders to metacity-1 and metacity-2 themes
fix color of disabled labels in checked buttons

Don't require GTK+3 at configure time when it's not needed

It's not needed when --disable-gtk3 --disable-gnome-shell is given.
remove sidebar background in wingpanel popovers
use blue highlight in wingpanel popovers
fix bold font in wingpanel popovers
gnome-panel: remove double background from menubar
gtk2: fix unreadable text in VMware horizon client (#628)
gnome-shell: fix jumping switcher list subitems (#636)

Fix typo in README.md
separate disabled linked buttons more clearly

Merge pull request #639 from feskyde/patch-1

Update Issues template
hide separator in font and filechooser buttons
don't use background images for entries

refactor xfwm theme

-now png based
-add borders to light theme
-add thicker bottom border for easier resizing
don't use selected_fg_color in weird places
use color swatches for selected bg and fg in svg assets

Merge pull request #622 from Beta1440/gnome-shell-slider-patch

Fix slider for gnome-shell

Fix slider for gnome-shell

The handle radius was preventing the slider from reaching either extreme.
This commit fixes issue #399.

Merge pull request #624 from feskyde/patch-1

Avoid people from ignoring the template and add details
merge xfce-notify theme into the gtk2 theme
use accent color for menu highlight (fix #135)
gnome-shell: fix volume mixer extension width (fix #486)
gnome-shell: add support for the multi-monitors-add-on extension (fix #464)
gtk3: reduce menubar height to match gtk2 theme (fix #535)
remove icon and text shadows from xfce panel (fix #479)
be more careful with notebook margins (fix #503)

Fix invisible text on window buttons (#505)

* Improve readability of gtk-color-scheme in gtkrc of gtk-2.0

* Fix invisible text on window buttons on xfce4-panel on Arc-Dark

Improvements - chrome dark theme variant (#506)



This uses arc-theme-darker as basis with values from previous version.
Which fixed the issues of changing colors when window is inactive.

* Remove localization from dark chromium theme variant

* Add packed version of chrome dark theme varian

* Use correct toolbar color in chrome dark variant

* Use button color for background tabs in chrome dark variant

Add arc-dark chrome theme (#497)



Source code of my theme from https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/arc-dark-chrome-theme/adicoenigffoolephelklheejpcpoolk/

* Add arc-dark-theme .crx

* Delete manifest.json~

* Delete messages.json~

* Delete messages.json~
Fix xfce4-panel icon size and progress-bar background (#498)

Add theming for Unity Greeter (#466)

* Add theming for Unity Greeter

* Generated css files from scss

- Replace alpha() and shade() in Sass with transparentize() and lighten()

* Rebase unity-greeter css code from upstream and drop excessive nesting

* Fix clock color and combo entry field

* Fix and improve Unity Greeter theming

- Fix panel icons
- Make password entry box rounder
- Add a bit of transparency to panel clock
Workaround for check and radio in FF GTK 3.20 (#473)
add a temporary workaround to make firefox scrollbars visible with gtk 3.20
nautilus: don't hide pane separator in dark variant (fix #459)
remove icon and text-shadow from xfce-panel

Revert "remove outdated dash-to-dock styling"

This reverts commit 8514157d7704b1a09129b0467c8510116ff32971.
gnome-shell: make aggregate-menu a little wider (fix #447)
add margins to buttons in osd toolbars
handle separators in split titlebars correctly
placesview: add padding to connect to server label
fix invisiable text in nautilus rename entry (#412)
fix check and radio margins in menus
bring back dark sidebars in filechooser dialog
less padding for slider-buttons in path-bars
fix image color in error and warning entries

Revert "disable broken stuff for now"

This reverts commit 5a860002c72960038d4adb62b9035cd471604f5f.
add some padding to buttons and entries

Fixed black bar on Google Chrome's theme (#403)
Fix black bar on Google Chrome's theme

Merge pull request #393 from leoheck/patch-1

Theme name variable should be lower case

Theme name variable should be lower case

This variable is used in line 88 which requires a lower-case arc-theme-master string.
avoid using cp --no-preserve since it's a GNUism and actually not needed

gtk2: don't set GtkTreeView::even_row_color (#376)

setting it breaks the treeviews in rawtherapee

Merge pull request #354 from somasis/master

m4/arc-gnome: Use correct pkg-config macro
compress all png assets with optipng

m4/arc-gnome: Use correct pkg-config macro

This allows for ./configure to detect prefixed versions of
pkg-config.

make gala notifications always light

fix #244

Merge pull request #347 from SuicSoft/patch-1

Fix typos / spelling in readme

Merge pull request #343 from Majal/patch-1

1. Re-execute as root, 2. Fail safe remove dirs

1. Re-execute as root, 2. Fail safe remove dirs

1. When not root, automatically re-execute as root instead of exit 1
2. Perform `rm -rf $lightdir $darkerdir $darkdir` only after download of package and extraction completes without error.

Merge pull request #332 from ExcaliburZero/alt-tags

Add better alt tags to images in readme

Add better alt tags to images in readme

Add more descriptive alt tags to the screenshots of the Arc themes in the readme file.

Adding a question to install the script

Added additional AUR packages

Added additional AUR packages

Adding new script to upgrade the theme

don't change background-color of unfocused window decorations

gnome-shell theme improvements and some osd redesign

gnome-shell: make candidate popup more readable
use libsass and update build system
make shadows on focused windows a bit darker
tweak destructive and suggested buttons again

fix unreadable text-color in progressbars

this fixes #76
